metadata.title: Your Python Journey Decoded. Become an Expert in Python Programming | by Rinu Gour | Towards Data Science
metadata.description: Python is the fastest-growing programming language today. It comes as a little surprise: Python is extremely versatile and is an easy to learn language. If you want to build a career in programming…

outgoing_paragraph_urls.anchor_text: The Ideal Python Guide You Need for Your Journey

all_paragraphs: Python is the fastest-growing programming language today. It comes as a little surprise: Python is extremely versatile and is an easy to learn language. If you want to build a career in programming, it makes sense to master this language.

According to the StackOverflow developers survey reports, Python is consecutively topping the Most Wanted programming language list for the last 3 years now. It is the Most Popular programming language after Javascript and Most Loved programming language after Rust. Whether you are a beginner or a professional this language is great for all purposes.
Do Have a Look!!16 Most Fascinating Facts about Python
Basics of a programming language are necessary for everyone to build strong foundations. Get well acquainted with these basic core programming concepts.
The Ideal Python Guide You Need for Your Journey
Python is a general-purpose programming language. It is used for all kinds of jobs.
Each of these fields involves different career opportunities so it’s better to decide where your interest lies in and work hard to master that area.
There are many repetitive tasks that you can automate with python. Start building small applications where you implement your ideas of how you can automate a task.

For example, you can automatically search for a particular object on the web and download its content (also called data scraping), Update and format large Excel files, send reminder emails and notifications, creating chatbots, and fill online forms automatically through python scripts.
Building small scripts for these automation tasks will strengthen your basic programming logic and by integrating the parts together you will be able to build projects.

To become an expert in programming one just cannot afford to ignore the data structures and algorithms. These subjects need to be studied thoroughly and implemented in-depth. These data-structures will be with you throughout your journey.

Data structures include stack, queue, lists, trees, graphs, etc. You need to be able to decide which data structure is most suitable for a problem and you will be able to generate this ability only when you dive deep into it.

Algorithms for sorting, searching, dynamic programming, greedy approach, recursions, backtracking etc are concepts that enhance your problem-solving skills and improve your skills to become a better programmer and develop you as someone who has the capability to build optimal solutions.

Syntax and programming construct only tell you what are you allowed to do and what you aren’t. Making small applications will tell you how to approach and solve a problem. Building projects and implementing your ideas into real-world will make you an expert in programming.
Implementing projects is the best way to be an expert. There’s no alternative to it.
There are many frameworks that make building projects easier. For web development, Django and Flask are mainly used to create large and complex web applications.
Be a Top Python Contender with these Amazing Python Projects

For a Data scientist, you need to do lots of projects. Numpy and Pandas are very useful for performing operations on data and analyzing them for building machine learning models. Make projects related to different types of learning (supervised, unsupervised and reinforcement learning)
Try building unique projects that you can implement into the real-world and showcase in your portfolio and resume.
Take a Step Closer to Your Dream with these Amazing Data Science Projects
You might not know some of the concepts in-depth. To expertise in python, I’ve listed out some advanced topics to study in-depth. These are as follows:

Now you know the details of how you can become proficient in python, its time to invest some of your time and commit towards learning. Learning python is fun and you can really go a long way if you are truly dedicated.
I hope this guide was resourceful. Good Luck on your Journey!
